title: Uburyo Bikora - Urusengero rwa Orbital
heading: Uburyo Bikora
intro: Umushinga wa Orbital Temple ugizwe nibintu bitatu bifitanye isano bifatanyiriza hamwe kohereza amazina murusengero mumwanya.
paragraph1: Icyogajuru kizenguruka isi ku butumburuke bwa kilometero 525, kibika amazina mu kwibuka. Sitasiyo yo hasi ivugana na satelite mugihe cyanyuze, ikohereza amazina abantu batanze kurubuga.
paragraph2: Iyo utanze izina, rihuza umurongo kandi rizoherezwa kuri satelite mugihe gikurikira kiboneka. Uzakira imenyekanisha rya imeri mugihe izina ryawe ryoherejwe neza murusengero rwa Orbital.
